content.name: Reactive Factions Retribution
content.description: "Reactive Factions Retribution" is a mod that will make factions react to your actions. The mod is an improved version of the Reactive Factions mod. Its purpose is to solve the main problems and inconveniences related to the basic version and content enrichment. Special thanks to Shuul for development permission and advising during implementation!
content.author: iomatix, Shuul and DeadAir
